mapper.select: select bs.board_singo_num as board_singo_num, b.board_num as board_num, b.member_id as member_id, b.board_content as board_content, bs.board_singo_reason as board_singo_reason from board b, board_singo bs where b.board_num = bs.board_num

select rs.reply_singo_num as reply_singo_num, r.reply_num as reply_num, r.member_id as member_id, r.reply_content as reply_content, rs.reply_singo_reason as reply_singo_reason from reply r, reply_singo rs where r.reply_num = rs.reply_num

select gs.group_singo_num as group_singo_num, g.group_num as group_num, g.group_name as group_name, g.group_singo_cnt as group_singo_cnt, gs.group_singo_reason as group_singo_reason from groups g, group_singo gs where g.group_num=gs.group_num
